Pre-Game Insights: JJ Redick, a younger, analytics-focused leader, has brought a refreshing approach to the franchise.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers have positioned themselves well in the early stages of the season.
The Lakers have beaten the Kings for the fourth time this season with five players scoring in double figures.
The Lakers have won five straight games.
Others: The Lakers parted ways with Darvin Ham shortly after exiting the playoffs in the first round at the hands of the Nuggets yet again.
The Lakers opened with a trio of wins.
